public class Utility
extends Property
This class is for utility board spaces. It extends the Property class.

  • Constructor Details

    • Utility

      public Utility​(java.lang.String name, int mortageValue, int index)
      This Constructs a utility with specified name, mortgage value and board index.
      Parameters:
      name - The name of the utility.
      mortageValue - The mortgage value of the utility.
      index - The board index of the utility.

  • Method Details

    • takeAction

      public void takeAction​(Player player, java.util.ArrayList<Player> players)
      This function is used to take the action of landing on a utility space. Depending on who lands on the space and what the status of the space is, a different action is performed.
      Specified by:
      takeAction in interface Sellable
      Specified by:
      takeAction in class Property
      Parameters:
      player - The player that lands on the Utility
      players - The list of players in the game
